title: Set up GitHub remote and sync
description: Configure git remote on GitHub using 'gh' CLI and API key. Ensure repository is pushed and 'bd sync' is configured.

title: Apply load_dotenv(override=True) pattern to google_maps.py for consistency
description: The GeminiClient uses load_dotenv(override=True) to ensure .env file takes precedence over shell environment variables. GoogleMapsClient should use the same pattern for consistency and to prevent environment variable conflicts.

title: Transitions: Implement plugin-based TransitionRegistry per EXTRACTION_PLAN.md section 4.1
Implement MapsHydrator
description: Implement the BaseHydrator for Google Maps enrichment. Refactor from integrations/maps/google_maps.py to hydrators/maps.py.

title: Review and commit new pipeline hydrators (annotations, timing, transitions_logic)
Reconcile Python version - README says 3.14+, pyproject.toml says >=3.10
description: README line 65 says Python 3.14+ but pyproject.toml requires-python = '>=3.10'. Pick one and update both.

title: Phase 2.6.5: Write E2E CLI integration tests
Clean up or commit trips/nz_2026 test data
close_reason: Test data was committed in 8f33c94. trips/nz_2026 is now tracked in git.

title: Add unit tests for WrapUpHydrator and EmotionalAnnotationHydrator
description: Both timing.py (96% coverage) and annotations.py (89% coverage) need dedicated unit tests. Currently only tested via integration tests.
close_reason: Added comprehensive unit tests for WrapUpHydrator (18 tests) and EmotionalAnnotationHydrator (31 tests). Coverage achieved: timing.py 100% and annotations.py 97%, significantly exceeding targets. Fixed implementation bug for None travel_mode handling.

title: Silent error handling in LocalFileProvider.get_venues() hides failures
description: In file_provider.py:54-56, JSON decode errors and validation errors are caught with 'continue', silently skipping invalid venue files. Per AGENTS.md philosophy 'Fail-Fast', this should raise explicit errors or at minimum log a warning. Current behavior masks data problems.

title: Remove or complete empty image_postprocessing files
description: src/itingen/utils/image_postprocessing.py is 0 bytes, along with related empty test files. Either implement or don't commit empty files.

title: Images: Add post-processing (full-bleed, auto-crop, format optimization)
description: Port image post-processing from scaffold: auto-detect borders, crop padding, resample to target aspect ratio using LANCZOS, optimize PNG/JPEG quality. Matches POC full-bleed aesthetic.

title: PDF: Port day banner generation to day-level hydrator/pipeline
description: Create BannerImageHydrator that generates 16:9 Imagen banners at the day level (not event level). Should aggregate events for the day and identify hero elements. Port prompt writing logic from scaffold.

title: Extract utils/fingerprint.py with TDD tests
close_reason: Completed fingerprint utility extraction with TDD: 8 tests, 100% coverage, committed in b6eb60a

title: Define SPE Core Abstractions (BaseProvider, BaseHydrator, BaseEmitter)
description: Implement the base interfaces for the Source-Pipeline-Emitter model in itingen.core.base. This includes the abstract definitions for Providers, Hydrators, and Emitters.

title: Implement AI Hydrators and Caching
description: Implement BaseHydrator for AI Narratives and Image Generation, including the asset caching mechanism in hydrators/ai/.

title: Venue model requires metadata but VenueMetadata has no defaults
description: Venue.metadata is a required field (no default), and VenueMetadata requires created_at and updated_at (no defaults). This makes programmatic venue creation verbose. Consider auto-generating timestamps or making metadata optional.

title: Decide what to do with local API debugging scripts (check_*.py): ignore, move to scripts/, or delete
Domain models use extra='allow' which may hide typos in field names
description: Event and Venue models in core/domain/ use ConfigDict(extra='allow') for extensibility. While intentional for Markdown flexibility, this means typos like 'locaton' instead of 'location' are silently accepted. Consider adding validation layer or strict mode option.

title: VALIDATION: Human review of generated thumbnail images
description: Generate thumbnails for example trip and NZ trip. Human validates: (1) 1:1 aspect ratio, (2) Ligne Claire style (bold outlines, flat colors, isometric), (3) Event-appropriate content, (4) No text/typography, (5) Fills frame properly. Document findings.

title: Refactor Hydrators to enforce immutability (mandatory)
description: Mandate that hydrate returns new Event objects (using dataclasses.replace or Pydantic model_copy), rather than mutating in-place. Essential for pipeline determinism, debugging, and agentic reasoning.

title: PDF: Implement PDF renderer with proper layout (replace basic markdown)
description: Port PDF rendering from scaffold POC: day banners as headers, event thumbnails inline, proper typography, spacing, page breaks. Use reportlab or similar. Match POC visual style.

title: Bug: AiCache writes *.jpg but Gemini returns PNG bytes (format/extension mismatch)
Close out EXTRACTION_PLAN.md - reconcile checkboxes with actual implementation status
description: Document has checkbox drift - some items marked incomplete are implemented, some marked complete have open issues. Either update checkboxes to match reality or add note that remaining work is tracked in beads.

title: Annotations: Move emotional annotations to config-driven system per EXTRACTION_PLAN.md section 4.2
Advanced: Implement prompt synthesis stage (Gemini combines context)
description: Port prompt synthesis from scaffold: Gemini takes event context + venue research + visual brief and synthesizes final cohesive image prompt. More intelligent than template-based approach.

title: Implement TransitionRegistry export
Implement WeatherSparkClient scraping logic
description: The integrations/weather/weatherspark.py client has cache support but get_typical_weather() returns None when no cache exists. Need to implement actual weather data fetching (scraping or API).

title: Missing integration tests for LocalFileProvider with malformed Markdown
description: The file_provider.py markdown parser handles edge cases but lacks tests for: malformed event blocks, missing headers, events with no fields, duplicate event headings, deeply nested structures. Current tests only cover happy path.

title: Transition Events and Venues to Domain Models
description: Refactor existing event and venue structures into pure domain models (Pydantic/Dataclasses) within itingen.core.domain.

title: Beads: decide whether to configure Claude integration (bd setup claude / beads plugin)
Add Makefile or pyproject scripts for common tasks (test, lint, generate)
description: Common tasks require remembering commands. Add task runner for: make test, make lint, make generate-example, etc.

title: Consider returning Path instead of str from BaseEmitter.emit()
description: Emitter returns str (the path) but semantically should probably return Path. Docstring says 'Returns the path to the generated artifact' but type is str.

title: Add output/ directories to .gitignore
Config system: Implement TripConfig class per EXTRACTION_PLAN.md section 5.2
Phase 1.2: Explore Source Files from scaffold project
close_reason: Completed thorough exploration of NZ trip source code

title: Config: Implement YAML-based theme loading per EXTRACTION_PLAN.md section 4.4
Add unit tests for TransitionHydrator to improve coverage from 68% to 85%+
description: The transitions_logic.py hydrator has 68% coverage with 21 untested lines. Need to add unit tests covering the various transition patterns (airport→ferry, lodging→drive, etc.)
close_reason: Added comprehensive unit tests for TransitionHydrator. Coverage improved from 9% to 98%, significantly exceeding the 85% target. Tests cover all 11 transition patterns, helper functions, edge cases, and location fallback logic.

title: Phase 2.7.2: Create second example trip (city break or road trip)
description: Validate generic system works for different trip types

title: Implement venue management tools
description: Implement list and create subcommands in CLI and core logic for venue management
close_reason: Venue management tools are fully implemented and tested. CLI has venues list/create commands with E2E tests passing.

title: Document core data structures (Event, Venue schemas)
description: Create docs/DATA_STRUCTURES.md with Event and Venue schema documentation

title: Advanced: Implement venue research for detailed image prompts
description: Port venue research from scaffold: generates detailed visual descriptions of venues (canonical_name, visual_description, primary_cues, secondary_cues, camera_suggestions). Caches per venue. Enriches thumbnail prompts.

title: Phase 1.1: Review Technical Decisions from scaffold project
close_reason: Completed comprehensive review of all 18 technical decision documents

title: Pass PipelineContext to hydrators (venues, config, provider)
description: Hydrators currently can't access venues or config loaded by the orchestrator. Create a PipelineContext dataclass and modify BaseHydrator.hydrate() to accept context parameter. CRITICAL: This is a blocking dependency for all future smart hydrators.

title: Fix PDF library deprecation: update ln=True parameters to modern PDF library API
Implement Core Pipeline Orchestrator
description: Develop the central orchestrator that manages the flow from Provider through a sequence of Hydrators to Emitters.

title: Images: apply thumbnail post-processing in ImageHydrator before caching
Consolidate date grouping logic between TimelineProcessor and MarkdownEmitter
description: TimelineProcessor groups events by day for PDF, but MarkdownEmitter has its own date grouping. Extract to shared utility or make TimelineProcessor the canonical source to prevent divergent behavior.

title: Phase 2.7.4: Add performance benchmark tests
description: Benchmark event ingestion, venue matching, PDF generation

title: Add AIDEV-NOTE comments to complex modules lacking them
description: Per project standards, all complex logic should have AIDEV-NOTE comments. Currently missing from: providers/file_provider.py (markdown parsing), utils/slug.py (tokenization algorithm), utils/json_repair.py (regex pattern). These would help future AI agents understand the code.

title: Fix CI: nz regression test uses hardcoded local scaffold baseline path
description:
CI failing on PR #6: tests/integration/test_nz_regression.py references hardcoded /Users/nohat/scaffold/... baseline markdown.

Recommendation:
- Add baseline markdown as a committed fixture under tests/fixtures/ (or tests/fixtures/regression/)
- Update test to load baseline from repo fixture path by default
- Optionally allow override via env var (e.g. ITINGEN_NZ_BASELINE_PATH) for local comparisons
- Ensure test passes on GitHub Actions runners

title: Fix Pydantic deprecation warning in base.py (access model_fields from class not instance)
VALIDATION: Human review of generated banner images
description: Generate banners for example/NZ trip days. Human validates: (1) 16:9 panoramic, (2) Wimmelbilderbuch style (detailed, busy), (3) Hero elements visible, (4) Cohesive scene, (5) Aerial/isometric view, (6) No text. Document findings.
notes: TEST IMAGE GENERATED: One banner generated for 2026-01-02 (Wai-O-Tapu/Taupo day). Location: output/test_banner/.ai_cache/images/83f820368af19e03ede6070705d87acd3afa441ea993697f8a21167de37a1cd8.jpg. Dimensions: 2752x1536 (aspect ratio 1.7917, within 1.4% of perfect 16:9). AWAITING human visual validation for: (1) Wimmelbilderbuch style, (2) Hero elements, (3) Cohesive scene, (4) Aerial/isometric view, (5) No text.

title: Implement WeatherHydrator
description: Implement the BaseHydrator for WeatherSpark enrichment. Refactor from integrations/weather/weatherspark.py to hydrators/weather.py.

title: Consider adding pydantic to explicit dependencies
description: The domain models use Pydantic BaseModel but pydantic is not listed in pyproject.toml dependencies. It may be a transitive dependency of google-genai, but explicit declaration would prevent breakage if that changes.

title: Phase 2.6.3: Wire TransitionRegistry into pipeline orchestrator
Fill in AGENTS.md placeholder sections (Code Style, Architecture Patterns)
description: Lines 289-295 have '[TO BE DETERMINED based on source analysis]' placeholders. Project is operational, these should be filled in.

title: Phase 1.4: Identify Test Cases
close_reason: Created comprehensive test plan with 200+ test cases across unit, integration, E2E, and validation tests

title: json_repair.py may produce invalid JSON with nested structures
description: The extract_json() function finds first '[' or '{' and last ']' or '}'. For text like 'result: [1,2] and {a:1}', it returns '[1,2] and {a:1}' which is invalid JSON. The test on line 98-109 acknowledges this limitation but it should either be fixed or clearly documented as a known limitation.

title: Add API key instructions to README (rate limits, cost implications)
description: README shows how to set up .env but doesn't explain rate limits or cost implications of AI image generation with Gemini.

title: Add unit tests for GoogleMapsClient
description: The integrations/maps/google_maps.py client is implemented but lacks unit tests. Current coverage: 26%. Need tests for get_directions() and caching logic.
close_reason: Added comprehensive unit tests for GoogleMapsClient. Coverage improved from 26% to 100%, exceeding the 70% target. Tests cover initialization, caching logic, API interactions, and error handling.

title: EXTRACTION_PLAN.md phase status is out of sync with actual progress
description: EXTRACTION_PLAN.md shows Phase 2.1 partially complete but Phase 2.2 and 2.3 items are also implemented (domain models, base abstractions, orchestrator, file provider). The plan status should be updated to reflect current progress.

title: Images: decide thumbnail target size (smaller than 1K?)
Fix unused imports and variables flagged by ruff linter
description: Ruff identified unused imports in tests: tempfile, Any, Dict, Optional in test_exif.py, and unused variable 'result' in test_pipeline_orchestrator.py. Run 'ruff check src/ tests/' to see full list.

title: BaseEmitter.emit returns bool but orchestrator only uses it for failure detection
description: The orchestrator collects emitter output paths in 'results' list (line 103) but appends the path string rather than using the bool return. The return value semantics are unclear - should emit() return the output path, a success bool, or both? Consider returning Optional[str] (path or None on failure).

title: Implement CLI in itingen/cli.py
Decide disposition of test_single_banner.py script (keep, move to scripts/, or delete)
PDF: Replace FPDF2 with ReportLab to match scaffold POC architecture
description: Current implementation uses FPDF2 but requirements.txt specifies reportlab>=4.0.0 and architecture docs mandate ReportLab. Scaffold POC uses ReportLab with proper Unicode font support (SourceSans3/NotoSans/DejaVuSans fallback). This mismatch causes Unicode rendering failures (→ character) and prevents proper validation against POC. Must migrate entire PDF rendering stack to ReportLab to match architecture.

title: Normalize duration handling: use duration_seconds as canonical field, format at render time
Test misclassification: write tests placed in TestReadExifMetadata class
description: In test_exif.py, test_write_exif_exception_handling() and test_write_exif_no_exif_object() are placed inside TestReadExifMetadata class (lines 146-170) but they test write functionality. They should be in TestWriteExifMetadata class for proper organization.

title: Phase 2.7.1: Create NZ trip validation test suite
description: Regression tests comparing itingen output to original scaffold output for NZ trip data

title: Add __main__.py for direct package execution
description: Currently 'python -m itingen' fails. Need to add src/itingen/__main__.py to allow direct package execution. This is a convenience feature for development.

title: Add missing type hints to BaseProvider/BaseHydrator/BaseEmitter abstract methods
description: The abstract base classes in core/base.py have pass statements in abstract methods. While functional, adding explicit NotImplementedError would be clearer. Also get_venues returns Dict[str, Any] but should return Dict[str, Venue] for type safety.

title: Docstring example in fingerprint.py has incorrect hash value
description: The docstring example in compute_fingerprint() shows a truncated SHA256 hash (40 chars) but the function returns a 64-char hex digest. Example shows 'f1d2d2f924e986ac86fdf7b36c94bcdf32beec15' which is also incorrect - should show the actual hash for {"a": 1, "b": 2}.

title: Phase 2.7.5: Improve test coverage to 85%
description: Add tests for low-coverage modules: orchestrator, file_provider, emitters
close_reason: Superseded by more specific test coverage issues: itingen-98i (TransitionHydrator), itingen-1h0 (WrapUpHydrator/EmotionalAnnotationHydrator). Current coverage is 88%.

title: slug.py keeps stopwords in first 2 positions which may be unintended
description: The slug algorithm keeps tokens in first 2 positions even if they're stopwords (line 99). This means 'The Estate Vineyard' becomes 'the-estate' keeping 'the'. This may be intentional for identity preservation, but should be documented with AIDEV-NOTE explaining the design decision.

title: Phase 2.6.4: Create example trip fixture for E2E testing
Fix banner image aspect ratio - images are square instead of 16:9
description: Banner images are being generated as square (1:1) instead of the expected 16:9 panoramic format. Need to investigate and fix the aspect ratio parameter in the Gemini image generation call. The BannerImageHydrator should generate 16:9 panoramic banners for day headers.

title: Advanced: Implement visual brief generation (Gemini + web search)
description: Port visual brief generation from scaffold: uses Gemini with Google Search grounding to generate SUBJECT/MUST_INCLUDE/AVOID/SOURCES for image prompts. Caches research. Improves image quality.

title: pyproject.toml entry point references non-existent CLI module
description: pyproject.toml line 46 defines 'itingen = "itingen.cli:main"' but there is no cli.py module in src/itingen/. This will cause ImportError when running 'itingen' command. Need to create cli.py or remove the entry point until Phase 2.6.

title: Harden secret scanning beyond Google 'AIza' pattern (broader patterns + CI hook)
Phase 2.7.6: PDF Banner Image Generation
close_reason: Implemented opt-in PDF day banner generation (Imagen 16:9) with caching + CLI wiring; added unit tests and PDFEmitter banner_generator hook.

title: Narratives: Port prompt templates from scaffold for richer style
description: Review scaffold narrative generation prompts. Port any missing templates, tone guidance, or context that makes narratives more engaging. Validate narrative quality matches POC.

title: Add .gitignore entries for coverage/artifacts (e.g. htmlcov/) to reduce accidental commits
PDF: Implement Unicode font support (SourceSans3/NotoSans/DejaVu fallback)
description: Scaffold POC downloads and caches Unicode fonts (SourceSans3, NotoSans, DejaVuSans) from GitHub with fallback chain. Supports Māori macrons and Unicode characters like →. After migrating to ReportLab, implement font download/cache system and register fonts with proper fallback logic.

title: Fix hardcoded system root paths to use project-relative paths
description: Find and replace all hardcoded system root paths (e.g. '/Users/nohat/') with project-relative paths. This includes documentation files, test files, and configuration files. External references should be clearly marked as such.

title: Remove BannerImageHydrator.generate() alias - pick one interface
description: BannerImageHydrator has both hydrate() and generate() doing the same thing to satisfy both BaseHydrator and BannerGenerator protocols. Code smell - should pick one interface.

title: Phase 2.7.3: Write migration guide for existing trips
description: Document how to convert scaffold-style trips to itingen format

title: Missing JsonEmitter implementation per EXTRACTION_PLAN.md Phase 2.5
Beads: decide whether to configure sync branch (bd migrate sync beads-sync)
Fix import in cli.py - move 'import json' to top of file
description: Line 208 has 'import json' inside function body. Imports should be at top of file per code style rules.

title: Extract utils/exif.py with TDD tests
Markdown: Enhance markdown renderer with image references
description: Update markdown renderer to include image references (thumbnail paths) in output. Add markdown syntax for embedding images inline with events. Useful for preview before PDF generation.
close_reason: Added markdown image syntax (![alt](path)) for events with image_path. Implemented with TDD: test-first, then implementation. All tests pass.

title: Implement PDF and Markdown Emitters
description: Implement the BaseEmitter interface for PDF and Markdown output formats, moving rendering logic into these role-based components.

title: Placeholder modules should have docstrings explaining intended functionality
description: Empty __init__.py files in config/, ingest/, rendering/, and integrations/ai|maps|weather/ lack docstrings. Per architecture docs, these will contain: config loader, markdown parser, PDF/Markdown emitters, and API integrations. Adding module docstrings would clarify intent.

title: Improve font.py test coverage (currently 65%)
description: src/itingen/rendering/pdf/fonts.py has 29 uncovered lines. Font download/registration logic is complex and undertested.

title: Refactor: Formalize Markdown Parser
description: Extract the brittle line-by-line parsing logic from LocalFileProvider._parse_markdown_file into a dedicated MarkdownEventParser class. A dedicated class allows for better unit testing of edge cases and prepares for potential migration to an AST-based parser.

title: Phase 2.6.2: Implement venue create command
VALIDATION: Compare final PDF output to scaffold POC
description: Generate complete PDF for NZ trip. Human compares side-by-side with original scaffold POC PDF: (1) Layout quality, (2) Image placement, (3) Typography/spacing, (4) Narrative quality, (5) Weather boxes, (6) Overall aesthetic. Document gaps.
close_reason: FAILED: Cannot validate PDF output against scaffold POC due to fundamental architectural mismatch. Current implementation uses FPDF2 but scaffold POC uses ReportLab. This causes Unicode rendering failures and prevents meaningful comparison. Created itingen-hds (P1) to migrate to ReportLab and itingen-q6c (P2) for Unicode font support. Validation must be re-run after migration.

title: Add unit tests for GeminiClient
description: The integrations/ai/gemini.py client is implemented but lacks unit tests. Current coverage: 47%. Need tests for generate_text() and generate_image() methods.
close_reason: Added comprehensive unit tests for GeminiClient. Coverage improved from 47% to 100%, exceeding the 70% target. Tests cover initialization, API key validation, text/image generation, and error handling. Also fixed GeminiClient implementation to use correct GenAI SDK methods.

title: Rotate compromised Google API keys (Gemini + Maps) and update local .env
PDF: Add weather summary box to day headers
description: Port weather box rendering from POC: typical weather summary at top of each day in PDF, with high/low temps, conditions. Should pull from WeatherHydrator data.

title: Phase 1: Foundation
description: Meta-issue tracking completion of Phase 1 (Foundation) deliverables. Refactored to align with SPE model.
close_reason: Phase 1: Foundation completed (all utilities extracted and tested)

title: Implement LocalFileProvider (SPE Source)
description: Transition the current ingest and config logic into a unified LocalFileProvider that implements the BaseProvider interface. This will handle Markdown events, YAML configs, and Venue registries.

title: Phase 1.3: Create Extraction Plan
close_reason: Created comprehensive extraction plan with 7 implementation phases

title: Add environment setup instructions for GOOGLE_API_KEY in README
description: Add setup instructions for GOOGLE_API_KEY environment variable to README.md for AI image generation features

title: Phase 2: Core SPE Abstractions & Domain Models
description: Meta-issue tracking the implementation of the structural foundation of the SPE model, including domain models and base interfaces.

title: Fix or remove failing test_nz_regression.py test
Orchestrator execute() silently ignores venues and config from provider
description: In pipeline/orchestrator.py:76-77, get_venues() and get_config() are called but results are not stored or passed to hydrators. The comment says 'for potential future use' but this wastes API calls. Either remove the calls or store results for hydrators to use.

title: exif.py exception handling uses bare except clauses
description: In exif.py lines 77-78 and 128-129, bare 'except Exception' blocks silently return None/False. This masks PIL import errors, permission errors, and disk full errors. Should catch specific exceptions (FileNotFoundError, PermissionError, etc.) and log others.

title: Phase 2.6.1: Implement venue list command
Images: thumbnail post-processing pipeline (crop/bleed/resize/encode)
